channel.title: Proxy Question
channel.description:
When I log into RS via a proxy it always shows my real ip I believe it's to do with socks5?
I have a question though, why does everytime I try recover an account with a proxy jagex refuses me onto the appeal page? if I use a transparent one it lets me but it knows my location, if I try a high anonymity(sp?) one it refuses me, I can't use a proxy site because it doesnt allow java!
Halp

item.title: Proxy Question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you want to use a proxy for runescape (or anything else written in Java), then it needs to be at least a SOCKS5 proxy, and you need to set it in your Java Control Panel before you open up your browser (set it in your browser too!).

Read full topic
